message: What's best? cloudera vm running on VMware player or my Macbook (Snow Leopard + Hadoop installation)

For OSX, all you'll need is Git, Java (already comes with the OS) and your favourite Java IDE. If you don't have a preferred one, we recommend Eclipse (right side for download links: http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-developers/indigor).
